generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and traffic flowing on it.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and sometimes poles.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including brick and modern structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street and in the background.
- terrain: Grass patches are visible along the sidewalk and near the road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible hanging over the road at intersections.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including yield signs and directional signs.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road, and one car is driving ahead.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- person: A person is visible standing near the motorcycle on the right sidewalk.
